name: Ominous Tales: The Forsaken Isle
description: Thereâ€™s an island 30 miles off the coast of England that the locals call 'The Forsaken Isle'. It is said to be home to ghosts, necromancers and dangerous man-eating creatures! Travel to the island to confront the evil warlock, a vicious pack of wolves and dark forces in order to escape with your life!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP/WindowsVista/Windows7/Windows8/Windows10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Basic 3D accelerator (No pixel shader support required) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
